question: Ethan has five times as many Twitter friends as Sophia. Joshua has one times as many friends on Twitter as Sophia. If Ethan has 153 friends on Twitter, how many Twitter friends does Joshua have?
answer:
Sophia has 153/5 = <<153/5=30>>30 Twitter friends.
Joshua has 1*30 = <<1*30=30>>30 Twitter friends.
#### 30
